Launch VPS Exclusive Offer

philadelphia August 16, 2017 @ 10:28 am, by Matt Zelasko

Hey guys! Launch VPS is back with another Low End Box special. We’ve featured these guys before than we’ve noticed great reviews and that they seem to be really easy to deal with and provide quick customer service.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their legal documents here.  They accept PayPal, all major credit cards, and Bitcoin.

In their own words: 

“LAUNCH VPS offers high-end, performance optimized SSD virtual servers. Founded in 2014 and based in the Philadelphia suburbs, we strive to build and support high quality, cost-effective hosting solutions for our customers. We have over a decade of experience in the hosting industry in the field of virtualization, cloud, and application hosting.

In addition to high-quality infrastructure, we have a distinct passion for assisting and enabling our customers. Our main objective is to offer a solid foundation, very flexible options, and incredibly helpful support. We feel this combines to offer our customers a superior experience which benefits their relationship to their end-users and clients.

We own our hardware running in a secure Philadelphia datacenter consisting of Supermicro Pro servers packed with fast DDR4 RAM w/ ECC, SSDs in RAID 10 w/ BBU for ~1Gbps I/O, hexa-core E5-2620 v3 CPUs, and A+B power all linked to our carrier blended redundant network. Additionally, our single inclusive control panel is fully functional including an HTML5 console, power options, boot options, snapshots, backups, ISO library, and usage graphs.

We want to make it easy for the LEB community to get started with our robust hardware platform, reliable network, and easy to use management features by offering special prices on the following exclusive LXC and KVM plans! There is nothing to lose with our 45-day no questions asked refund!”

Here’s the offers:
